column1: Little Goat Diner////Since they don't take reservations
column2: we didn't know what to expect in terms of a wait. Lucky for us
column3: we went late enough that we only had a few minutes to wait before being shown to a nice
column4: comfy booth that fit the five of us quite nicely. The wallpaper that covers the walls inside reminds me of something my grandmother once had
column5: and the entire place had a somewhat cozy
